attributes.comment:
RE: 2006-004
The necessity to raise fees to an excessive level for immigration is concerning.
There are adoptive parents spending thousands on adoption, not to mention the
taxes they already pay and now the fees are being raised to obsurd levels. I
can understand the necessity to cover costs, but this increase is excessive and
does not consider the audience which it effects!!! For this reason, calling
this document an "adjustment" is ridiculous.
I certainly hope that you receive enough comments regarding this document that is
reconsidered and the fees are "adjusted" to reflect a more reasonable increase
(if it is even necessary).
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Nancy Meyers
